title: Who is YungSweetRo? Travis Scott accused of cheating on Kylie Jenner with lookalike model
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Travis Scott has been accused of being unfaithful to his girlfriend Kylie Jenner following their split.

But just who is Instagram model Rojean Kar?

Let's take a look.

She's an Instagram model with a huge following - more than 100,000 followers.

The 27-year-old Calabasas girl is a sexy Instagram model who is a fitting figure for Kylie - they look very similar.

The girls both have dark locks and defined curves, which run in the Kardashian-Jenner family.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Rojean, who goes by the Instagram name YungSweetRo, likes to treat her fanbase to raunchy underwear pics and scantily clad selfies.

Some of Rojean's sultry photos feature her in lacy black underwear as she poses on a bed, looking very much like makeup mogul Kylie.

Another shows the model lying down laughing while on her phone, with her cleavage on full display.

(Image: Getty Images for The Met Museum/)

(Image: Instagram)

It seems that the model lives a lavish life of partying and luxury, as documented with snaps on her account.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Her hometown in LA boasts huge mansions and expensive houses with four bathrooms and outside pools, so it's no surprise that the model comes across in this way.

Her Instagram account is on private when the scandal first broke, but that didn't stop her from throwing shade at billionaire Kylie earlier this year.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

"tell ur bd i said thx", she captioned a saucy post of her lying in bed.

The model threw a dig at Kylie, as she was referring to Travis, who is Kylie's baby daddy.

There's a long history between Rojean and Travis - the pair go way back, as shown on Rojean's Instagram post from 2013.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

She holds a giant teddy bear with a man believed to be Travis laughing beside her.

But most recently, Kar shared a sultry image of herself at a slot machine in a casino in August, nearly a week after Scott was seen at a casino with similar surroundings and carpeting.

It has sparked speculation that Travis has been unfaithful to Kylie.
description: Rojean Kar is a dead ringer for Kylie Jenner - but who is she?
authors: Getty Images For The Met Museum
